```{r}
library(recount3)
human_projects <- available_projects()
proj_info <- subset(
    human_projects,
    project == "ERP109920" & project_type == "data_sources"
)

rse_gene_d_fibro <- create_rse(proj_info)
```
```{r}
rowRanges(rse_gene_d_fibro)

```
```{r}
assay(rse_gene_d_fibro, "counts") <- compute_read_counts(rse_gene_d_fibro)

```

rse_gene_d_fibro <- expand_sra_attributes(rse_gene_d_fibro)
colData(rse_gene_d_fibro)[

]
